title: Fatal error: TH/TH.h: No such file or directory when compiling from source
body_html:
I write "-e git://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git#egg=pytorch" in pytorch_requirment.txt, and install pytorch as follows and get fatal error:

[xxx]$ pip install -r pytorch_requirment.txt
Obtaining pytorch from git+git://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git#egg=pytorch (from -r pytorch_requirment.txt (line 1))
Updating ./src/pytorch clone
Running setup.py (path:/home/xxx/src/pytorch/setup.py) egg_info for package pytorch produced metadata for project name torch. Fix your #egg=pytorch fragments.
Requirement already satisfied: pyyaml in ./anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages (from torch->-r pytorch_requirment.txt (line 1))
Requirement already satisfied: numpy in ./anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages (from torch->-r pytorch_requirment.txt (line 1))
Installing collected packages: torch
Found existing installation: torch 0.2.0.post1
Uninstalling torch-0.2.0.post1:
Successfully uninstalled torch-0.2.0.post1
Running setup.py develop for torch
Complete output from command /home/xxx/anaconda2/bin/python -c "import setuptools, tokenize;file='/home/xxx/src/pytorch/setup.py';f=getattr(tokenize, 'open', open)(file);code=f.read().replace('\r\n', '\n');f.close();exec(compile(code, file, 'exec'))" develop --no-deps:

-- Building version 0.2.0+5d09fcd
running egg_info
writing requirements to torch.egg-info/requires.txt
writing torch.egg-info/PKG-INFO
writing top-level names to torch.egg-info/top_level.txt
writing dependency_links to torch.egg-info/dependency_links.txt

reading manifest file 'torch.egg-info/SOURCES.txt'
writing manifest file 'torch.egg-info/SOURCES.txt'
running build_ext
-- Building with NumPy bindings
-- Not using cuDNN
-- Not using CUDA
-- Not using NCCL
-- Building with distributed package
building 'torch._C' extension
gcc -pthread -fno-strict-aliasing -g -O2 -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O3 -Wall -fPIC -I/home/xxx/src/pytorch -I/home/xxx/src/pytorch/torch/csrc -I/home/xxx/src/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include -I/home/xxx/src/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH -I/home/xxx/src/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THPP -I/home/xxx/src/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN -I/home/xxx/src/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen -I/home/xxx/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/numpy/core/include -I/home/xxx/src/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THD -I/home/xxx/anaconda2/include/python2.7 -c torch/csrc/PtrWrapper.cpp -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-2.7/torch/csrc/PtrWrapper.o -D_THP_CORE -std=c++11 -Wno-write-strings -fno-strict-aliasing -DWITH_NUMPY -DWITH_DISTRIBUTED
gcc -pthread -fno-strict-aliasing -g -O2 -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O3 -Wall -fPIC -I/home/xxx/src/pytorch -I/home/xxx/src/pytorch/torch/csrc -I/home/xxx/src/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include -I/home/xxx/src/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH -I/home/xxx/src/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THPP -I/home/xxx/src/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN -I/home/xxx/src/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen -I/home/xxx/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/numpy/core/include -I/home/xxx/src/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THD -I/home/xxx/anaconda2/include/python2.7 -c torch/csrc/Generator.cpp -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-2.7/torch/csrc/Generator.o -D_THP_CORE -std=c++11 -Wno-write-strings -fno-strict-aliasing -DWITH_NUMPY -DWITH_DISTRIBUTED
